Administrator login info

Username: Admin

Password: admin

The Admin user has full permissions in the system. You should change the Admin password as soon as possible! Do this in the OpenCms workplace that you can access through the "Advanced" context menu in the toolbar.

Open View > Administration and then select Account Management and User Management.

Note that for this demo the users Author, Editor, Gallator and Templator have been created as well. You should also change their passwords or disable / delete these users completely.
